title: Come bring in Maye with me my Maye is fresh and greene: (a subiectes harte, an humble mind) to serue a mayden Queene. A discourse of rebellion, drawne forth for to warne the wanton wittes how to kepe their heads on their shoulders.
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publicationDate: Anno Domini 1570. The first of Maye.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
